column1: Little Goat Diner////Menu was quite unusual
column2: with a big Korean food influence.  If we wanted Korean food
column3: we would have gone to a Korean restaurant.  Not what either of us expected and neither of us found the selections too appealing.  All the hype and heck
column4: I could get a patty melt anywhere..nothing special about that
column5: I wanted something that sounded good.    Nothing really did.  Kimchi was one of the sides and other items I had never heard of
column6: with no explanations of what those were.  I'm not a newbie to dining
column7: whatsoever and my friend was a chef instructor and we both were very disappointed
column8: so we left after our wait.
